item.title: Applications Now Open for CMDIS BYOND “Build Your Own Nano Device” Program
item.description: Date: Thursday, August 8, 2024 12:00 AM - Wed , September 4, 2024 5:00 PM - Cleanrooms play a crucial role in various industries, where contamination is minimized or eliminated during various manufacturing processes. The Center for Materials, Devices, and Integrated Systems’ Micro and Nanofabrication Clean Room is offering a program to provide specialized training and knowledge in clean room operations for undergraduate students to build a strong foundation; applications are due by September 4.

item.title: Rensselaer at Work Session to Highlight Single Course Enrollment Options
item.description: Date: Wednesday, August 21, 2024 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Register to join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., as he reviews the online graduate programs for working professionals and provides course enrollment options to make an immediate impact on one’s work. Participants can also explore courses for developing valuable skills that benefit employee and employer alike.

item.title: RPI Student Selected for Inaugural U.S. Women’s Cyber Team
item.description: Rensselaer’s Elan Smolar Eisenberg ’25, an undergraduate with a dual major in computer science and information technology and web science (ITWS), has been selected as one of 12 members of the inaugural U.S. Women’s Cyber Team. In collaboration with teams from Japan, Europe, and the United Kingdom, Eisenberg and her teammates will head to Tokyo in November to compete in the Kunoichi Cyber Games at the 2024 Code Blue Conference.

item.title: HR to Present “Helping Families Eat Healthier” Brunch with Benefits
item.description: The Division of Human Resources is pleased to present its next virtual Brunch with Benefits session 11:00 a.m. to noon on Thursday, August 22. Led by Registered Dietitian Lindsey Cumoletti, August’s session will focus on “Helping Families Eat Healthier;” CDPHP representatives from will also be available to answer any questions related to the health plan. Register for this session today!

item.title: Fac/Staff Quick Learn Webinar to Offer Tips for Engaging Students
item.description:
Date: Wednesday, August 21, 2024 11:00 AM - 11:30 AM - Assigning reading assignments and micro video lectures prior to class are great ways for students to gather initial knowledge. Register to join Maureen Fodera, of the Office of Undergraduate Education, as she offers tips on how instructors can use these means to engage and motivate students and help them extract important details/understandings….
